SEARCH
Module com.example.samplesalad
Package com.example.samplesalad.model

Class Metronome

java.lang.Object
com.example.samplesalad.model.Metronome
public class Metronome extends Object
The Metronome class represents a simple metronome with basic start/stop functionality and BPM (beats per minute) control.

This class allows for starting and stopping a metronome, adjusting the BPM, and resetting the metronome to its default state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Metronome

      public Metronome()
      Constructs a Metronome with the specified BPM and playing state.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the metronome.

      This method sets the playing state of the metronome to true.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the metronome.

      This method sets the playing state of the metronome to false.

    • getBpm

      public int getBpm()
      Returns the current BPM of the metronome.
      Returns:
      the current BPM.

    • setBpm

      public void setBpm(int bpm)
      Sets the BPM of the metronome.
      Parameters:
      bpm - the desired BPM to set.

    • togglePlay

      public void togglePlay()
      Toggles the playing state of the metronome.

      If the metronome is currently playing, it will stop; if it is stopped, it will start playing.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the metronome to a default BPM (e.g., 120) and stops it.

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Returns whether the metronome is currently playing.
      Returns:
      true if the metronome is playing, false otherwise.

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Retrieve the corresponding user
      Returns:
      user The user of this Metronome

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User newUser)
      Sets the user of this Metronome
      Parameters:
      newUser - The user to set as this Metronomes user
